item.description:
I am a research fellow at the Centre for Social Sciences, Hungarian Academy of Sciences Centre of Excellence. My key research area is the political economy of the European Union's and its members’ fiscal governance.

I employ a wide variety of methods in my research, particularly automated text analysis (and attached various machine learning approaches), network analysis and more traditional econometric techniques. I also happen to teach some of these in R as well. All of my courses and workshops are open sourced and can be acccesed via my GitHub page or the links below.
